column4: hi everyone. which program in ubuntu should i open in order to play Windows Media Audio?
By the way, i have XINE.
mirv, i read the page, and it has a heading called Windows media audio, but no instructionns.
mirv, how do i load up rhythmbox?
you need the gstreamer mad plugin right?
accdng to synaptic, i've already downloaded gstreamer0.8-mad.
did you commit your download in synaptic?
that will be only for mp3 afaik
you want to play .wma's in rb?
you will need nonfree proprietary codecs to play DRM'd .wma's
win32codecs and mplayerplug-in should do it for firefox
did you see the restricted formats page on the wiki?
yes. and then i came here to get additional assistance. that page wasn't clear for me.
you need to add the repositories that will give you access to the codecs
i have all multi and universe added already. could it be that it has a different name?
w32codecs aren't in multi and universe
